Texts.Eng: The Alchemist provides allies with unique statuses and inflicts dangerous ailments on enemies. It provides access to craftable, throwable potions.
The Bard plays music to support allies with increased resistance. It provides access to craftable instruments.
The Botanist grows herbs and gently tends to fields with great efficiency. It provides access to craftable seeds and better farming capabilities.
The Chef cooks wonderful delicacies to keep hunger satiated and give various bonuses. It provides access to cheap, craftable unique foods.
The Engineer tinkers to create awesome mechanisms and buildings. It provides access to cheap, craftable electronics and scientific components.
The Jeweler forms beautiful accessories that augment players with unique effects. It provides access to craftable accessories that augment armor.
The Medic supports their allies with passive healing. It provides access to cheap, craftable medical supplies, such as bandages and salve.
The Miner digs deep without fear, lighting up the darkness to find ores. It provides access to better ore conversion, enabling better resource usage.
The Smith toils away to make dangerous weapons and strong armor. It provides access to craftable melee weapons and means to upgrade all weapons.
The Tamer easily tames monsters and heals tamed creatures on the go. It provides access to cheap, craftable Capture Pods, as well as Advanced Capture Pods.
